text: Bahi pavamalidile kulya, Yesu nkummuja Petulo kuchidoni, “Petulo,21:15-17 Mmalemba ilembwijwe Simoni, lina lyake linji Petulo mwana wanga Yohana! Dachi, muhiu ùnangutamwa kupunda ava?” Nang'e nkunnyang'ula kuchidoni, “Elo, Nang'olo, wako ùnimala kuva nangu nakutamwa.” Yesu nkunnyaulila kuchidoni, “Valise vanu vangu unguvalandenye na angandolo.”
